item.title: EMA SMA Cross Algorithm & Backtest
item.description: This algorithm is based on the “moving average crossover” strategy. Traditionally, this strategy involves taking two moving averages – a “slow” one that averages over a longer time window and a “fast” one that averages over a shorter time window – and buy/sell based on when the two moving averages crossover. I used a 50-day simple moving average (SMA) as the “slow” one and 10, 20, 30, and 40-day exponential moving averages (EMA) as the fast ones.
